jassimp

Class AiColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jassimp.AiColor

  • public final class AiColor
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for colors.

    The wrapper is writable, i.e., changes performed via the set-methods will modify the underlying mesh.

    • Field Summary
